001package io.github.ai4ci.config;
002
003import java.util.Collections;
004import java.util.List;
005
006import org.immutables.value.Value;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonDeserialize;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonSerialize;
010
011import io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.ImmutableSetupConfiguration;
012import io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.SetupConfiguration;
013
014/**
015 * A facet of the simulation configuration that defines the default setup and
016 * any modifications to it. The default setup provides the base configuration
017 * for the simulation, while modifications allow for overriding specific
018 * parameters or adding additional configurations on top of the default. This
019 * interface is designed to be immutable and can be easily
020 * serialized/deserialized using JSON.
021 *
022 * <p>
023 * Facets will be processed by the {@link ExperimentConfiguration} to produce a
024 * final {@link SetupConfiguration} that combines the default configuration with
025 * any specified modifications. This allows for flexible and modular
026 * configuration of the simulation setup, enabling users to easily customize
027 * their simulation runs by specifying different facets with varying defaults
028 * and modifications.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * The resulting SetupConfiguration will initialise a single simulation which
032 * will be potentially executed multiple times with different random seeds and
033 * with different ExecutionConfigurations. This allows for efficient reuse of
034 * the same setup across multiple runs, while still enabling variability through
035 * the use of modifications and random seeds.
036 *
037 */
038@Value.Immutable
039@JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableSetupFacet.class)
040@JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableSetupFacet.class)
041public interface SetupFacet {
042
043        /**
044         * Creates an {@code ImmutableSetupFacet} with the given default
045         * configuration and modifications. The default configuration serves as the
046         * base setup, while the modifications allow for overriding specific
047         * parameters or adding additional configurations on top of the default.
048         *
049         * @param config        the default setup configuration to use as the base
050         *                      setup
051         * @param modifications optional modifications to apply on top of the default
052         *                      configuration. These can override specific parameters
053         *                      or add new configurations.
054         * @return an {@code ImmutableSetupFacet} instance containing the default
055         *         configuration and any specified modifications
056         */
057        public static ImmutableSetupFacet of(
058                        ImmutableSetupConfiguration config,
059                        PartialSetupConfiguration... modifications
060        ) {
061                return ImmutableSetupFacet.builder().setDefault(config)
062                                .addModifications(modifications).build();
063        }
064
065        /**
066         * Returns the default setup configuration for this facet. This configuration
067         * serves as the base setup for the simulation, providing the initial
068         * parameters and settings that will be used unless overridden by
069         * modifications.
070         *
071         * @return the default {@link SetupConfiguration} for this facet
072         */
073        SetupConfiguration getDefault();
074
075        /**
076         * Returns a list of modifications to apply on top of the default setup
077         * configuration. These modifications can override specific parameters or add
078         * new configurations to customize the simulation setup. If no modifications
079         * are specified, this method returns an empty list.
080         *
081         * @return a list of {@link PartialSetupConfiguration} instances representing
082         *         modifications to apply on top of the default configuration, or an
083         *         empty list if no modifications are specified
084         */
085        @Value.Default
086        default List<PartialSetupConfiguration> getModifications() {
087                return Collections.emptyList();
088        }
089}
